item.title: Security
item.description: These are some of the areas where I have dedicated my efforts when it comes to security: All vital and IPR associated systems are protected via MFA Grandular IAM permissions configured for AWS services, users and roles I always adhere to the Least Privilege Principle Web Application Firewall (OWASP) Web application XSS, SQL Injection, encoding, securing cookies, role & claims based authz I always encrypt data at rest and also when in transit I always encrypt systems credentials (including 3rd party’s) and always include extra layer of encryption All passwords are hashed To isolated blast radius of environments by separating dev/test & prod into different accounts.
